description: Detects when a singe rules or all of the rules have been deleted from the Windows Defender Firewall
author: frack113
name: A Rule Has Been Deleted From The Windows Firewall Exception List
query: (winlog.event_id:"2006" AND (NOT ((ModifyingApplication:(C\:\\Program\ Files\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*)) OR (ModifyingApplication:"C:\Windows\System32\svchost.exe") OR ((ModifyingApplication:C\:\\ProgramData\\Microsoft\\Windows\ Defender\\Platform\\* AND ModifyingApplication:*\\MsMpEng.exe)))))
